name: Mortician
description: '''Mortician''' is an American [[death metal]] band formed in [[Yonkers, New York]], in 1989. They have released most of their albums since their ''House by the Cemetery'' [[Extended play|EP]] with [[Relapse Records]], but have released their latest album with their own label, Mortician Records. They have toured several times throughout America and Europe. The band is inspired by [[Horror film|horror]] and [[Slasher film|slasher]] films, which is heavily expressed in the lyrics, artwork, and the uses of [[Sampling (music)|samples]] throughout their discography.
